      • cooldown_check

        public void cooldown_check(double cooldown)
        Parameters:
        cooldown, - how long is the attack cooldown of this character If the character stays in cooldown status for longer time than the specified attack cooldown, cooldown status is false

      • character_collision_check

        public static void character_collision_check(App app)
        If the distance between wizard and the gremlins or red gremlins is less than 20 pixel, decrease the lives of wizard by 1 and the wizard respawn when wizard is not invincible If the lives of wizard is less or equal to 0, then player loses
        Parameters:
        app, - update data to app
